products.title: Sevilla True White Vertical Blind
products.description: The brightest of their whites, the sevilla blackout true white vertical blind is as pure as the driven snow and effortlessly elegant too. Create a lovely, tranquil space with this blind and maximise the size of any room. products.title: Sevilla Tranquility White Vertical Blind
products.description: This vertical blind is soft white and will look beautiful hanging at the window, surrounded by a sea of colour or amongst its own shade in a whitewashed room. The sevilla blackout range has a high quality finish and offers superb light control.
